titleInfo.title: Jerrold Moore, Chief Admin. Assistant to Mayor Henry Loeb, 1971

mods.abstract: Jerrold Moore discusses the Sanitation Strike,the Hiring Freeze, and his position as Chief Administrative Officer for mayor Henry Loeb.
